last_episode_to_air.name: Thirst Trap
last_episode_to_air.overview: Drinking water is so poorly managed that our most basic resource has emerged as a terrifying black market. The stakes are critical, yet for most of us, it's barely on our radar.

name: Black Market
overview: In his most personal project to date, Michael K. Williams explores underground economies in America and around the world.

episodes.name: New Jersey Drive
episodes.overview: An international-car-theft operation based out of Newark, N.J., is spotlighted in the series premiere.

episodes.name: Illicit Abalone
episodes.overview: For the fishermen of Hout Bay, South Africa the post-Apartheid years have meant less opportunity as they are forced to turn to poaching to survive.

episodes.name: Iron Pipeline
episodes.overview: Gunrunners move weapons from American states with loose laws to states with stricter ones, in a neverending flow that law enforcement can't seem to stop.

episodes.name: The Lean Scene
episodes.overview: Across the U.S., a powerful opioid-based cough syrup has become a dangerous pop culture sensation.

episodes.name: Higher Stakes
episodes.overview: In New York City, an illegal gambling underworld flourishes, but sometimes the largest losers are the ones running the games.

episodes.name: Lifted in London
episodes.overview: In a vicious cycle of dependency and despair, drug addicts shoplift meat and other everyday items and sell them to cash-strapped Brits struggling to get by in today's UK.

episodes.name: Scam Likely
episodes.overview: Young street genius entrepreneurs have evolved from selling drugs to stealing identities and printing credit cards.

episodes.name: The Art of Boosting
episodes.overview: Designer clothes are on sale for unbelievably low prices because the only cost is the risk of getting caught boosting.

episodes.name: Rage Against the Machines
episodes.overview: That hit song or sold out show may not be what it seems. Digital trappers are manipulating streaming platforms to turn nobodies into somebodies.

episodes.name: Cannabiz
episodes.overview: The wave of cannabis legalizations has deepened divides and complicated the marijuana industry; corporate weed is thriving, but the black market for cannabis still looms large.

episodes.name: Inside Job: Skin Deep
episodes.overview: Black market beauty enhancement has become a game of Russian roulette for people looking to get big. But in the trans community, the black market might be a life saver.

episodes.name: Thirst Trap
episodes.overview: Drinking water is so poorly managed that our most basic resource has emerged as a terrifying black market. The stakes are critical, yet for most of us, it's barely on our radar.
